name: Furnace Simulator 2019
description:
Furnace Simulator 2019 Credits
- Written in Python
- Only written with no team of developers

You can do alot of things in this game, but it's in development, expect unfinished features or bugs. You can do:

  • Check furnace temperature
  • Cook and eat things
  • You can put coal inside the furnace

This is in development, criticize if needed for improvements.
